sentences.sContent: If SNS wants to press the meaning of its metaphrase " social network serves " for, the history should be quite long.
sentences.sContent_eng: If SNS wants to press the meaning of its metaphrase " social network serves " for, the history should be quite long.
sentences.sCn: SNS假如要按它直译的意思“社会网络服务”来说，历史应该相当悠久。

sentences.sContent: Chinese-English mutual translations are not only the metaphrase or paraphrase on language itself, but more focus on the culture background of the language.
sentences.sContent_eng: Chinese-English mutual translations are not only the metaphrase or paraphrase on language itself, but more focus on the culture background of the language.
sentences.sCn: 中英互译不仅仅是语言学层面上的直译或意译，而是更多地关注到语言背后的文化背景。
